name: General Club Meeting w/ Club photos
description:
Club photos will be taken tomorrow during our regular Rubik’s Cube Club meeting.
After photos, we’ll be offering CFOP method guidance for those looking to improve their solving techniques. It’s a great chance to learn new tips or refine your speed.

name: General Club Meeting
description: We’ll be offering CFOP method tutorial for those looking to improve their speed and swtich from beginner method

name: 3x3x3 Rubik's Cube Beginner Workshop
description:
We'll have a workshop especially for beginner to learn how to solve a 3x3x3 Rubik's Cube!
Only 25 spots available! Sign Up: https://forms.office.com/r/RGb9qKYpb8

name: Please Be Solve UBC 2025
location: UBC, Irving K Barber Learning Centre, Room 155, Address: 1961 East Mall, Vancouver, BC V6T 1Z1
description:
Official WCA competition at UBC (blind and FMC events) Competitors Limit: 25
Sign Up (WCA account required): https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/competitions/PleaseBeSolvedUBC2025/register

name: What Are the Odds Coquitlam 2025
location: Coquitlam, Walton Elementary School Gymnasium, Address: 2960 Walton Ave, Coquitlam, BC V3B 6V6
description:
Official WCA competition (3x3, 5x5, 3x3bld, and pyraminx) Competitors Limit:85
Sign Up (WCA account required): https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/competitions/WhatAretheOddsCoquitlam2025/register
